node.title: Tim Tszyu risks world title shot against Takeshi Inoue
node.alt: Tim Tszyu and Takeshi Inoue stand looking into each other's eyes
node.description: Tim Tszyu is gambling his position as mandatory challenger for the WBO light welterweight title when he takes on Takeshi Inoue in Sydney on Wednesday night.
node.content:
["Tim Tszyu risks a guaranteed world title shot when he steps into the ring to fight Takeshi Inoue in Sydney tonight.\u00a0", "The second-generation pugilist is the mandatory challenger for Brian Casta\u00f1o's WBO light middleweight strap.", "However, that opportunity will evaporate should\u00a0Tszyu lose.\u00a0", "So often fighters would bypass such a step to immediately fight for the belt, although Tszyu isn't your ordinary fighter.\u00a0", "\"There's risk in everything you do in life,\" Tszyu told ABC Sport.\u00a0", "This will be Tszyu's third fight of the calendar year and his fifth outing during the pandemic, making him the most active rated boxer over that period.", "
Takeshi Inoue likely to be Tim Tszyu's biggest test\u00a0
", "", "
Takeshi Inoue will be looking to end Tim Tszyu's title ambitions.(Gety Images: Mark Metcalfe)
", "Despite wins over former world champion Jeff Horn and title challenger Dennis Hogan, this is widely believed to be Tszyu's toughest assignment yet.\u00a0", "Inoue is 17-1-1, with his only professional defeat coming from\u00a0the highly credentialed Jaime Mungu\u00eda, making him work every second of every round, to earn a decision victory.\u00a0", "The Japanese boxer is world rated by the sanctioning bodies and possess a chiselled physique that turned heads at his open work out.\u00a0", "He's an aggressive fighter who unloads as soon as he steps in-range of his opponent, something Tszyu is acutely aware of.\u00a0", "\"You can hit him nonstop and he's just going to keep coming. It always presents a dangerous challenge when you've got an opponent like that.\"\u00a0", "", "
Takeshi Inoue and Jaime Munguia fought a tremendous 12-round battle in 2019, which marked the Japanese fighter's only professional defeat.(Getty Images: Bob Levey)
", "Tszyu (19-0, 15KOs) is on a five-fight knockout streak that stretches back to December 2019, and he won't have to go searching for his Inoue, who will be prepared to trade in centre ring.\u00a0", "\"I see myself as a straight killer,\" Tszyu responded when quizzed about how he plans to expose Inoue.\u00a0", "\"As soon as I see an opening, as soon as I see a weakness, I'm going to exploit it and go in for the kill.\"", "Tszyu weighed in at 69.52kg for the fight, while Inoue came in at 69.68kg.\u00a0", "
Junior middleweight division set to open up
", "If Tszyu can stop Inoue, it would send shockwaves around the junior middleweight neighbourhood.", "The division staged a unification bout in July between belt holders Casta\u00f1o and Jermell Charlo.\u00a0", "The pair fought to a controversial draw, with many pundits believing Casta\u00f1o had done enough to win the fight.", "", "
Jermell Charlo (right) and Brian Castano (left) fought to a split draw in July.(Getty images: Edward A. Ornelas)
", "The Argentine WBO title holder certainly won the story of the fight, entering the bout as a substantial underdog, only to recast how the division is viewed.", "Charlo's reputation as the dominant force at the weight class was significantly diminished after the 12-round war in San Antonio.\u00a0", "Tszyu's rise up the ranking has been noted overseas and his surname certainly sparks the interest of seasoned fight fans but the question remains whether he can continue to look as impressive as the quality of opponent increases.\u00a0", "
Risking mandatory status a dangerous move
", "", "
Tim Tszyu is risking his world title shot in this contest.(Getty Images: Mark Metcalfe)
", "The last time an Australian was in a similar position, it had a catastrophic ending for Australian boxing.\u00a0", "Jeff Horn risked a world title shot against Ryota Murata in 2019, choosing to fight a tune up against compatriot Michael Zerafa, only to be stopped in dramatic fashion.\u00a0", "Horn would later avenge the loss but never fought for a belt again.\u00a0", "Australia and Japan have a storied rivalry in the fight game, headlined by Lionel Rose's famous decision victory over Fighting Harada to claim the world bantamweight crown in 1968.\u00a0", "Rose received a public reception on his return home and subsequently became the first Aboriginal to be named Australian of the year.", "", "
Lionel Rose beat Masahiko 'Fighting' Harada on points to claim the world bantamweight title in 1968.(Keystone/Hulton Archive/Getty Images))
", "Jeff Fenech claimed his first world title against Satoshi Shingaki, who he beat twice in the same calendar year in 1985. Fenech went on to forge a hall of fame career with three world titles in as many weight classes.", "More recent examples include Anthony Mundine's seesawing affairs against Crazy Kim and Yoshinori Nishizawa, climbing off the canvas to beat both men in competitive fights.\u00a0", "Jayde Mitchell and Jack Brubaker claimed unlikely decision victories over Orient Pacific belt holders on Japanese soil, at the famed Korakuen Hall, beating Shintaro Matsumoto and Suyon Takayama respectively.\u00a0", "The last notable Japanese triumph on Australia soil came in 2016 when lightweight wildcard Hurricane Futa stormed through Will Tomlinson, ending his career inside 40 seconds.\u00a0", "Tszyu and Inoue will write the latest chapter in the two nation's fistic history tonight.", "
When is Tim Tszyu vs Takeshi Inoue?
", "The preliminary card is set to get underway at 6pm AEDT, before the pay-per-view portion of the undercard starts at 7pm.", "The ring walks for Tszyu vs Inoue will take place at roughly 9:30pm AEDT, although that is subject to change.\u00a0\u00a0", "
How can I watch Tim Tszyu vs Takeshi Inoue?
", "The fight will be available to buy on Fox Sports' Main Event channel for $59.95.", "You'll be able to follow all the action from QDOS Bank Arena, including the undercard,\u00a0in our live blog."]
